titleStmt.title: Experiments, notes, &c. about the mechanical origine or production of divers particular qualities among which is inferred a discourse of the imperfection of the chymist's doctrine of qualities : together with some reflections upon the hypothesis of alcali and acidum / by the Honourable Robert Boyle ...
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Flesher for R. Davis ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
